titleStmt.title: The case of ministers maintenance by tithes, (as in England,) plainly discussed in conscience and prudence. Humbly propounded to the consideration of those gentlemen of the committee, who are in consultation about it. / By John Gauden, D.D.
titleStmt.author: Gauden, John, 1605-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Maxey, for Andrew Crook, and are to be sold at the signe of the Green Dragon in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Green Dragon in Pauls Church-yard
